content: For SMYLE forcing, I've told Nan to follow CESM2-LE members 51-100. This means: CMIP6 with SMBB (smoothed biomass-burning) plus bug fixes (to SO2/SO4). Speak out now if you disagree.

@Stephen Yeager What are the 4 restart dates / year?
NVM: I think they are 2, 5, 8, and 11?
@Stephen Yeager The clm subdirectories are all empty.
